channel.title: 数字花园
channel.description: 最近的10条笔记 on 数字花园

item.title: ARM
item.description: Internationalization allows users to translate text in the Quartz interface into various supported languages without needing to make extensive code changes.

item.title: CPP
item.description: Quartz emits listing pages for any folders and tags you have. Folder Listings Quartz will generate an index page for all the pages under that folder.

item.title: Linux
item.description: Quartz uses Katex by default to typeset both inline and block math expressions at build time.

item.title: RTOS
item.description: Quartz supports Mermaid which allows you to add diagrams and charts to your notes.

item.title: STM32
item.description: Syntax highlighting in Quartz is completely done at build-time.

item.title: EE
item.description: 学习电子基础 kanban [In progress] id6[Create renderer so that it works in all cases. We also add some extra text here for testing purposes.

item.title: 处理器架构
item.description: Wikilinks were pioneered by earlier internet wikis to make it easier to write links across pages without needing to write Markdown or HTML links each time.

item.title: 新能源汽车
item.description: A lot of social media platforms can display a rich preview for your website when sharing a link (most notably, a cover image, a title and a description).

item.title: 行业报告
item.description: Quartz features a graph-view that can show both a local graph view and a global graph view.
